title: FishieProtecc
subtitle: 2D Game Engine
description: Developed a 2D game engine for the GAM150 module in DigiPen Institute of Technology. Collaborated with designers to create a 2D children's game. Implemented artificial intelligence and the user interface. Designed the art and composed the music.

title: Recoil
subtitle: 2D Game Engine
description: Developed a 2D game engine for the GAM200/250 module in DigiPen Institute of Technology. Collaborated with designers to create a 2D action platformer game. Implemented graphics rendering using low-level api, OpenGL and user interface interactions.

title: Out of Reach
subtitle: 3D Game Engine
description: Developed a 3D game engine for the GAM300 module in DigiPen Institute of Technology. Collaborated with designers to create a 3D action platformer game. Implemented graphics rendering using low-level API, OpenGL and user interface interactions

title: Shipwreck Crewmates
subtitle: 3D Game Engine
description: Developed a 3D game engine for the GAM350 module in DigiPen Institute of Technology. Collaborated with designers to create a 3D multiplayer party game. Optimize existing graphics rendering using low-level API, OpenGL. Contributed to the art and composed the music

title: SalesWhale Clone
subtitle: Web Dev Practice
description: Develop a frontend react application based on a Figma mockup for a job application.
